title: BOARDWALK / PAYPHONE
description: Payphone, for calling folk. Call everyone.

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "A metal payphone under a yellow pla..."
dialogueTree.text: A metal payphone under a yellow plastic dome. There's a bitter, caustic taste on the tip of your tongue as you look at the handset.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Life is garbage."
links.text: Life is garbage.

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial a random n..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial a random number: 005-24-03-155.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Still calling..."
links.text: Still calling...

links.title: Inland Empire: "This feels wrong. Should you be doi..."
links.text: This feels wrong. Should you be doing this?

links.title: Payphone: "End of tone. Someone picks up."
links.text: End of tone. Someone picks up.

links.title: Payphone: ""Pierre? Is that you, Pierre?" The..."
links.text: "Pierre? Is that you, Pierre?" The voice is female and sounds about a hundred years old.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Say you're not Pierre... that seems..."
links.text: Say you're not Pierre... that seems like a better idea. (You don't know why.)

links.title: You: ""Yes, it's me -- Pierre.""
links.text: "Yes, it's me -- Pierre."

links.title: Payphone: ""So nice of you to find the time to..."
links.text: "So nice of you to find the time to call me! It gets so lonely. Even the animals have died."

links.title: You: ""What kind of pets did you have?""
links.text: "What kind of pets did you have?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Are you sure you're Pierre? Your v..."
links.text: "Are you sure you're Pierre? Your voice, it's different... I... there... chrysanthemum..."

links.title: Payphone: "Her voice is drowned in white noise..."
links.text: Her voice is drowned in white noise. Sounds like waves washing a beach, growing in volume until the call suddenly disconnects.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You get a sinking feeling. It makes..."
links.text: You get a sinking feeling. It makes you look if Lieutenant Kitsuragi overheard you. To your relief, he did not.

links.title: You: ""That's... not good.""
links.text: "That's... not good."

links.title: You: ""It gets lonely even when you're wi..."
links.text: "It gets lonely even when you're with people."

links.title: You: ""I might be? What's Pierre like?""
links.text: "I might be? What's Pierre like?"

links.title: You: ""No, this is not Pierre.""
links.text: "No, this is not Pierre."

links.title: Payphone: ""Do you have any news about Pierre?""
links.text: "Do you have any news about Pierre?"

links.title: You: ""Who is Pierre?""
links.text: "Who is Pierre?"

links.title: Payphone: ""He's my sister's grandson. He used..."
links.text: "He's my sister's grandson. He used to visit me as a lad... Fine young man..."

links.title: Payphone: ""But who are you then? A salesman o..."
links.text: "But who are you then? A salesman of some sort? Modern goods are rubbish. And I can't afford them anyhow. It's a shame what you did to our country..." The woman moans and the phone lines howl in unison with her.

links.title: You: ""I'm not a salesman, I was just cal..."
links.text: "I'm not a salesman, I was just calling a random number and you somehow ran with it."

links.title: Payphone: ""This is because we are bred to be..."
links.text: "This is because we are bred to be leaders. I can hear the common or mixed background from your voice."

links.title: Payphone: ""I just so wanted it to be Pierre....."
links.text: "I just so wanted it to be Pierre... Have a pleasant evening, prankster."

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone."
links.text: Disconnect tone.

links.title: You: ""Yes, I'm a salesman. What exactly..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm a salesman. What exactly did we do to your country?"

links.title: Payphone: ""You ruined it and you sold it to f..."
links.text: "You ruined it and you sold it to foreigners. You don't own anything if everything is for sale."

links.title: Payphone: ""Give it a thought. Goodbye.""
links.text: "Give it a thought. Goodbye."

links.title: You: ""I don't know who I am... But who a..."
links.text: "I don't know who I am... But who are you?"

links.title: Payphone: ""I was a baroness.""
links.text: "I was a baroness."

links.title: Payphone: "Pause. There is silence on the othe..."
links.text: Pause. There is silence on the other end.

links.title: Payphone: ""You won't get me and you won't get..."
links.text: "You won't get me and you won't get my money!"

links.title: Payphone: "Phone hanging up."
links.text: Phone hanging up.

links.title: You: ""No, I'm a police officer.""
links.text: "No, I'm a police officer."

links.title: Payphone: ""To hell with the police! To hell w..."
links.text: "To hell with the police! To hell with you..."

links.title: You: ""No, I have nothing.""
links.text: "No, I have nothing."

links.title: Payphone: ""Sure you do. No one has anything n..."
links.text: "Sure you do. No one has anything nowadays."

links.title: Payphone: ""You're either a salesman or a stat..."
links.text: "You're either a salesman or a statistician of some kind. I am not interested in cooperating."

links.title: You: ""Yes, Pierre is dead.""
links.text: "Yes, Pierre is dead."

links.title: Payphone: ""What a pity... I'm afraid I won't..."
links.text: "What a pity... I'm afraid I won't be coming to the funeral. I.... there... chrysanthemum..."

links.title: You: "Hang up. [Leave.]"
links.text: Hang up. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial a random n..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial a random number: 005-51-17-912.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Still calling..."
links.text: Still calling...

links.title: Authority: "Again? Seriously?"
links.text: Again? Seriously?

links.title: Payphone: "Someone with a masculine voice pick..."
links.text: Someone with a masculine voice picks up:

links.title: Payphone: ""Hello, Girard speaking!""
links.text: "Hello, Girard speaking!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hello, Girard. Technically speaking..."
links.text: Hello, Girard. Technically speaking, you're electricity.

links.title: Drama: "No, what *you* are is a *surprise*,..."
links.text: No, what *you* are is a *surprise*, get his wife on the phone...

links.title: You: ""Hey, Girard, get your wife for me,..."
links.text: "Hey, Girard, get your wife for me, will you?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Wh-who is this?" The man does not..."
links.text: "Wh-who is this?" The man does not understand.

links.title: You: ""Doesn't matter, put her on, I don'..."
links.text: "Doesn't matter, put her on, I don't like waiting."

links.title: Payphone: ""Who the fuck do you think you are..."
links.text: "Who the fuck do you think you are talking to me like that?" The voice on the phone is suddenly very agitated.

links.title: You: ""I'm the guy who's fucking your wif..."
links.text: "I'm the guy who's fucking your wife, Girard. Now put her on before I lose my patience."

links.title: Payphone: ""Just tell me what's going on here!..."
links.text: "Just tell me what's going on here!" Now you hear fear too. The voice gets further away from the microphone, then yells: "Bian, come here!"

links.title: Payphone: "The sounds are muffled. You can mak..."
links.text: The sounds are muffled. You can make out two people: a man and a woman called *Bian*. They are talking to each other in agitated voices. There's a shuffle of feet, children maybe?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Amid the howling in the wire you ma..."
links.text: Amid the howling in the wire you make out a woman's voice with a thick Samaran accent: "Girard... Girard, this is a joke. Someone is making a joke..."

links.title: Payphone: "More shouting. You're pretty sure y..."
links.text: More shouting. You're pretty sure you hear a man saying *fuck* several times. Then the crackle in the phone line gets violently loud, like the surf breaking.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You hear a faint *thuck*. You could..."
links.text: You hear a faint *thuck*. You could swear you're hearing furniture falling over.

links.title: You: ""Stop it! I was just kidding, I'm n..."
links.text: "Stop it! I was just kidding, I'm not sleeping with your wife!"

links.title: Payphone: "You can't make out a single word, j..."
links.text: You can't make out a single word, just vague voices. One more, a child, has joined. Something breaks -- or falls over? Footsteps approaching!

links.title: Payphone: "Something hits the phone with a lou..."
links.text: Something hits the phone with a loud crack of plastic and microphone hiss -- after that you are left with the disconnect tone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What the hell are you doing?" The..."
links.text: "What the hell are you doing?" The lieutenant has been keeping a distance, but steps closer now.

links.title: You: ""I was just having a bit of fun, wh..."
links.text: "I was just having a bit of fun, what's the big deal?"

links.title: You: ""You're right, Kim -- this went wro..."
links.text: "You're right, Kim -- this went wrong, I shouldn't have done this..."

links.title: You: ""I don't understand what I did wron..."
links.text: "I don't understand what I did wrong."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were making *prank calls*." No..."
links.text: "You were making *prank calls*." Not a muscle moves in the lieutenant's face.

links.title: Volition: "What in the name of god did you jus..."
links.text: What in the name of god did you just do?

links.title: You: ""Wait Girard! Let's just keep talki..."
links.text: "Wait Girard! Let's just keep talking, buddy!"

links.title: You: ""Get away from her, I'm a cop!""
links.text: "Get away from her, I'm a cop!"

links.title: You: ""I'm not going to stop. I'm going t..."
links.text: "I'm not going to stop. I'm going to keep fucking your wife, Girard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What the hell are you doing?" The..."
links.text: "What the hell are you doing?" The lieutenant has been keeping a distance, but steps closer now.

links.title: You: ""What? I'm just having a bit of fun..."
links.text: "What? I'm just having a bit of fun, what's the big deal?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Big deal?!" Not a muscle moves in..."
links.text: "Big deal?!" Not a muscle moves in the lieutenant's face.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "This has lowered his opinion of you..."
links.text: This has lowered his opinion of you -- but only a little.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's just go, I've had enough of..."
links.text: "Let's just go, I've had enough of this phone booth."

links.title: You: ""You're right, Kim -- it went wrong..."
links.text: "You're right, Kim -- it went wrong. Horribly wrong. I shouldn't have done this..." (Hang up.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, you shouldn't have.""
links.text: "You're right, you shouldn't have."

links.title: Empathy: "He accepts your apology."
links.text: He accepts your apology.

links.title: You: ""Guillaume. Guillaume le Million.""
links.text: "Guillaume. Guillaume le Million."

links.title: Payphone: ""Very funny, asshole. Why don't you..."
links.text: "Very funny, asshole. Why don't you grow up! Oh, and disco is dead!"

links.title: You: ""I'm Mazov. Kraz Mazov.""
links.text: "I'm Mazov. Kraz Mazov."

links.title: Payphone: ""Very funny, asshole.""
links.text: "Very funny, asshole."

links.title: You: ""I'm no one, I'm sorry, I shouldn't..."
links.text: "I'm no one, I'm sorry, I shouldn't have done this..."

links.title: You: ""It's Harry, put her on, I don't li..."
links.text: "It's Harry, put her on, I don't like waiting."

links.title: You: ""It's Pierre, now put her on. I don..."
links.text: "It's Pierre, now put her on. I don't like waiting."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry it was a stupid joke, I..."
links.text: "I'm sorry it was a stupid joke, I shouldn't have called, it's stupid -- I'm so sorry."

links.title: Payphone: ""You shouldn't mess with people lik..."
links.text: "You shouldn't mess with people like this..." His voice is very calm. "You go have a nice day now."

links.title: You: ""Is Alec Tricity there? I need to s..."
links.text: "Is Alec Tricity there? I need to speak with Alec Tricity, please."

links.title: Payphone: ""No, but I got a feeling Al Kickura..."
links.text: "No, but I got a feeling Al Kickurass is gonna make an appearance if you ever call this number again. Have a good one, asshole!"

links.title: Payphone: "Phone hanging up."
links.text: Phone hanging up.

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone."
links.text: Disconnect tone.

links.title: You: ""Girard... what a douche name... Ch..."
links.text: "Girard... what a douche name... Change it -- change your name!"

links.title: Payphone: ""What are you, like five?" A woman'..."
links.text: "What are you, like five?" A woman's voice shouts something in the background and when Girard speaks again his voice is hushed...

links.title: Payphone: ""Thanks for calling, asshole!""
links.text: "Thanks for calling, asshole!"

links.title: You: ""Sorry, wrong number.""
links.text: "Sorry, wrong number."

links.title: Payphone: ""Don't worry about it, buddy -- hap..."
links.text: "Don't worry about it, buddy -- happens to all of us. You have a nice day now!"

links.title: You: "Hang up. [Leave.]"
links.text: Hang up. [Leave.]

links.title: Drama: "What *you* are is a *surprise*, get..."
links.text: What *you* are is a *surprise*, get his wife on the phone...

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial a random n..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial a random number: 005-99-77-313.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Still calling..."
links.text: Still calling...

links.title: Payphone: "*Still* calling..."
links.text: *Still* calling...

links.title: Payphone: ""Stop calling me, man!" Someone pic..."
links.text: "Stop calling me, man!" Someone picks up. The voice on the other end is slightly hysterical.

links.title: Payphone: ""I'll get you your money, alright?..."
links.text: "I'll get you your money, alright? I just need 'til tonight. Let me work."

links.title: You: ""Uh... who is this?""
links.text: "Uh... who is this?"

links.title: Payphone: "There's a moment of silence before..."
links.text: There's a moment of silence before the voice speaks again, more calmly: "You got the wrong number, don't call here again."

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone."
links.text: Disconnect tone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are we about *done* with this now?..."
links.text: "Are we about *done* with this now?" The lieutenant has taken a few steps back.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm..." A single *khm* lets you kn..."
links.text: "Khm..." A single *khm* lets you know the lieutenant is ready to move now.

links.title: You: ""Yes, but a slight change of plans..."
links.text: "Yes, but a slight change of plans -- I want this delivered to the Whirling-in-Rags in Martinaise."

links.title: Payphone: ""Tethys, I uh..." The young man rea..."
links.text: "Tethys, I uh..." The young man realises something. "Hey, you're not Tethys! Screw you and don't ever call here again, you're fucking with some *serious* people!"

links.title: You: ""We could all be a bit kinder to ea..."
links.text: "We could all be a bit kinder to each other, don't you think? Consider your debt paid, my friend."

links.title: Payphone: ""My *debt?* I don't fucking owe you..."
links.text: "My *debt?* I don't fucking owe you, it's..." The young man realises something. "Who is... ah never mind, I don't have time for this..."

links.title: Suggestion: "He does not seem to be overly thank..."
links.text: He does not seem to be overly thankful of your kindness as he hangs up.

links.title: You: ""You seem to be in some sort of tro..."
links.text: "You seem to be in some sort of trouble. Maybe I can help you, I'm a police officer."

links.title: Payphone: "The phone gets hanged up fast as li..."
links.text: The phone gets hanged up fast as lightning, all you hear is a little shuffle of nylon as the hand moves on the other end.

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial a random n..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial a random number: 005-11-11-313.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: ""I'm tired..." A man answers, fast..."
links.text: "I'm tired..." A man answers, fast this time. His voice is hoarse from cigarettes. You hear typing in the background.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Sounds like he hasn't talked to any..."
links.text: Sounds like he hasn't talked to anyone in quite a while.

links.title: You: ""What are you tired of?""
links.text: "What are you tired of?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Writing. I hate writing so much......"
links.text: "Writing. I hate writing so much... But I have to get back to it."

links.title: Payphone: "The man disappears with a sigh."
links.text: The man disappears with a sigh.

links.title: Payphone: "You do not hear the customary disco..."
links.text: You do not hear the customary disconnect tone, just silence in the handset -- the machine is still waiting for you to dial a number.

links.title: Logic: "Seems like it did not have time to..."
links.text: Seems like it did not have time to swallow the coin. This sometimes happens.

links.title: Interfacing: "Lucky you. The call went too fast f..."
links.text: Lucky you. The call went too fast for the payphone to register. You can still make a new one without paying.

links.title: You: ""I'm tired too.""
links.text: "I'm tired too."

links.title: Payphone: ""If I could go just one month witho..."
links.text: "If I could go just one month without writing. No, two months... I could regenerate my brain. Fucking liberalism..."

links.title: You: ""Is there anything I can do to help..."
links.text: "Is there anything I can do to help you? I'm with the police."

links.title: Payphone: ""There is nothing.""
links.text: "There is nothing."

links.title: You: "Dial a random number -- with your e..."
links.text: Dial a random number -- with your eyes closed.

links.title: Interfacing: "You close your eyes and put your in..."
links.text: You close your eyes and put your index finger on the rotary dial, then pull down on the number, then move one up and repeat the motion, twice...

links.title: Interfacing: "Strange. This is not how you starte..."
links.text: Strange. This is not how you started before.

links.title: You: "Wait -- what did I just do?"
links.text: Wait -- what did I just do?

links.title: Interfacing: "You dialled 001. This is not the ar..."
links.text: You dialled 001. This is not the area code of Revachol. It is another destination -- on another isola. Some far-off nation state.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "005 is Revachol ZoC -- 001 is Graad..."
links.text: 005 is Revachol ZoC -- 001 is Graad, on the Graadian isola, where the telephone was invented. The next two digits you dial are the area code for the city of Mirova...

links.title: You: "Keep dialling..."
links.text: Keep dialling...

links.title: Interfacing: "41 -- 44 -- 47 -- the rotary dial f..."
links.text: 41 -- 44 -- 47 -- the rotary dial feels cold from the sea air.

links.title: You: "Keep dialling..."
links.text: Keep dialling...

links.title: Interfacing: "11 -- 17 -- 361 -- your fingers kee..."
links.text: 11 -- 17 -- 361 -- your fingers keep moving like a spider, every time the ring rotates back with a little ring of metal, like a bell tolling.

links.title: You: "There's more?"
links.text: There's more?

links.title: Interfacing: "Yes. 451 -- 67 -- 451 -- you are go..."
links.text: Yes. 451 -- 67 -- 451 -- you are going deeper now, into some unknown place. Far away from this island of matter and its telecommunication networks....

links.title: You: "Finish it."
links.text: Finish it.

links.title: Interfacing: "451 -- you have dialled god knows h..."
links.text: 451 -- you have dialled god knows how many numbers. The headset has been waiting silently to relay a signal -- surely nothing can come of this, you think. But it does. A connection.

links.title: Payphone: "An ultra-long-distance call. Your e..."
links.text: An ultra-long-distance call. Your ear fills with a crackle, the wash of a strange ocean full of white noise. A little bird starts ringing in there, not like the local calling tone before. No, a small ring in a cage of distortion, far away, a distant network of phones...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling in the night...."
links.text: Calling in the night....

links.title: Empathy: "The saddest sound in the world."
links.text: The saddest sound in the world.

links.title: Half Light: "Both pitiful and terrifying. You fe..."
links.text: Both pitiful and terrifying. You feel your pulse rising with each ring...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling still..."
links.text: Calling still...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ringing by the bedside of a dark bu..."
links.text: Ringing by the bedside of a dark but capacious apartment with long windows... you know this to be true.

links.title: Endurance: "The handset starts slipping from yo..."
links.text: The handset starts slipping from your sweaty palm... your breathing is heavy.

links.title: You: "Long windows... how do I know that?"
links.text: Long windows... how do I know that?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You just do. And you know it is goi..."
links.text: You just do. And you know it is going to hurt.

links.title: You: ""Kim...""
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is too far away to h..."
links.text: The lieutenant is too far away to hear your yelp. The sea wind blows...

links.title: You: "Hang it up."
links.text: Hang it up.

links.title: Volition: "That's right. You *can*. Whatever y..."
links.text: That's right. You *can*. Whatever you're doing here, you can just stop it and go on with your life.

links.title: You: "Hang up."
links.text: Hang up.

links.title: Payphone: "The headset lands in the cradle wit..."
links.text: The headset lands in the cradle with a clank. There it sits -- still warm from your hand. You have no idea what just happened.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who cares. Run. Go. Don't think abo..."
links.text: Who cares. Run. Go. Don't think about this. Do police work, it's all there is.

links.title: You: "No. Let it call. I *must*."
links.text: No. Let it call. I *must*.

links.title: Volition: "You can't. Some strange force is ke..."
links.text: You can't. Some strange force is keeping the headset glued to your hand, your ear listening to the ring in the speaker...

links.title: You: "Let it call more."
links.text: Let it call more.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling still..."
links.text: Calling still...

links.title: Payphone: "Then the ocean breaks. Out of the d..."
links.text: Then the ocean breaks. Out of the depths, a woman's voice emerges. Small. The dearest thing you've ever heard.

links.title: Payphone: ""Hello." She sounds sleepy."
links.text: "Hello." She sounds sleepy.

links.title: You: ""Hello.""
links.text: "Hello."

links.title: Payphone: ""Mhm," she hums, her voice warm fro..."
links.text: "Mhm," she hums, her voice warm from sleep.

links.title: Payphone: ""Who is this?""
links.text: "Who is this?"

links.title: You: ""I want to die.""
links.text: "I want to die."

links.title: Payphone: ""What?" It takes a second for her t..."
links.text: "What?" It takes a second for her to realize what you said.

links.title: You: ""I don't know why I said that.""
links.text: "I don't know why I said that."

links.title: Payphone: ""Oh no... is that you?" Her voice s..."
links.text: "Oh no... is that you?" Her voice sounds like she's waking up now. Still plaintive, tired...

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is too much... You need to rec..."
links.text: This is too much... You need to recede...

links.title: You: ""A creature is a creature. I wish I..."
links.text: "A creature is a creature. I wish I was the wind."

links.title: Payphone: ""Oh no, not this... what time is it?""
links.text: "Oh no, not this... what time is it?"

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Payphone: "Silence. The connection falters. Yo..."
links.text: Silence. The connection falters. You hear her last words repeated back to you in an echo:

links.title: Payphone: ""Is that you?""
links.text: "Is that you?"

links.title: You: ""Your voice makes me want to turn i..."
links.text: "Your voice makes me want to turn into dust."

links.title: You: ""I want to live -- with you...""
links.text: "I want to live -- with you..."

links.title: You: ""Who is this?""
links.text: "Who is this?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Dora." She's still confused. "Who..."
links.text: "Dora." She's still confused. "Who is this? The connection is bad..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Dora. The name feels like a *gift*...."
links.text: Dora. The name feels like a *gift*. A gift that was meant for you -- to make it possible to live.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "And fight."
links.text: And fight.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "In the distorted distance you hear..."
links.text: In the distorted distance you hear someone turning next to her. Bedsprings rattle.

links.title: Volition: "Don't react. Whatever you do, don't..."
links.text: Don't react. Whatever you do, don't react to that last thing.

links.title: You: ""Is someone *there*?""
links.text: "Is someone *there*?"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "No answer. You're not sure but you..."
links.text: No answer. You're not sure but you think you hear a *man's* voice in the background. It's covered in pain and white noise...

links.title: You: "Don't react."
links.text: Don't react.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "It doesn't matter if you react or n..."
links.text: It doesn't matter if you react or not. You still think you hear a *man's* voice in the background. It's covered in pain and white noise...

links.title: You: ""I'm a revolutionary servant of hum..."
links.text: "I'm a revolutionary servant of humanity. I will free mankind and abolish the classes. I will raise the dead." (Proceed.)

links.title: Payphone: ""You're not a revolutionary, Harry...."
links.text: "You're not a revolutionary, Harry... You're drunk."

links.title: Logic: "You only have two, maybe three thin..."
links.text: You only have two, maybe three things left to say before the change runs out.

links.title: You: ""Harry? How do you know my name?""
links.text: "Harry? How do you know my name?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Because it's me... Look, I don't u..."
links.text: "Because it's me... Look, I don't understand what you're saying or why you're calling me. You seem drunk."

links.title: You: ""Harry? Who's Harry?""
links.text: "Harry? Who's Harry?"

links.title: Payphone: "She sighs. "Look, I don't understan..."
links.text: She sighs. "Look, I don't understand what you're saying, or why you're calling me. You seem drunk."

links.title: You: ""Harry? Who's Harry -- are you slee..."
links.text: "Harry? Who's Harry -- are you sleeping with him? Is *Harry* there?!"

links.title: Payphone: ""I don't understand what you're say..."
links.text: "I don't understand what you're saying."

links.title: You: ""Harry? Who's Harry -- are you slee..."
links.text: "Harry? Who's Harry -- are you sleeping with him? I'm also Harry!"

links.title: You: ""I'm not drunk.""
links.text: "I'm not drunk."

links.title: Payphone: ""Oh god..." There's silence, it's h..."
links.text: "Oh god..." There's silence, it's heavy as tin. The white noise howls.

links.title: You: ""Hey.""
links.text: "Hey."

links.title: Payphone: ""Do you know what time it is? It's..."
links.text: "Do you know what time it is? It's so late here..." Sounds like she's looking for a clock on the night stand.

links.title: Payphone: ""It's four o'clock, Harry! I need t..."
links.text: "It's four o'clock, Harry! I need to wake up in two hours."

links.title: You: ""Do you want to party?""
links.text: "Do you want to party?"

links.title: Payphone: ""No, I want to go to sleep...""
links.text: "No, I want to go to sleep..."

links.title: You: ""I want to talk about me. Who am I?..."
links.text: "I want to talk about me. Who am I? You sound like you know me."

links.title: Payphone: ""What do you want to talk about? Th..."
links.text: "What do you want to talk about? That we haven't talked about already..."

links.title: Endurance: "This is bad, you feel your right ha..."
links.text: This is bad, you feel your right hand on the handset cramping up with pain...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "No. We're not gonna do this. Your h..."
links.text: No. We're not gonna do this. Your hand is *not* going to cramp up, not now.

links.title: You: ""Where are you? You sound like you'..."
links.text: "Where are you? You sound like you're in another world."

links.title: Payphone: ""I'm in Mirova. Sleeping.""
links.text: "I'm in Mirova. Sleeping."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Twenty-two million people live in M..."
links.text: Twenty-two million people live in Mirova, the capital city of Graad. It is the capital of the world after Revachol was destroyed.

links.title: You: ""You're in Mirova, right?""
links.text: "You're in Mirova, right?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Yes, I'm in Mirova. Sleeping.""
links.text: "Yes, I'm in Mirova. Sleeping."

links.title: You: ""Where are you going in two hours?""
links.text: "Where are you going in two hours?"

links.title: Payphone: ""To work.""
links.text: "To work."

links.title: You: ""Where?""
links.text: "Where?"

links.title: Payphone: ""The Academy. Where I work.""
links.text: "The Academy. Where I work."

links.title: You: ""The Academy? That sounds better th..."
links.text: "The Academy? That sounds better than my job. I'm happy."

links.title: You: ""My job is sad and terrible. It has..."
links.text: "My job is sad and terrible. It has dead bodies in it."

links.title: You: ""Pfft, Academy... my job is *real*.""
links.text: "Pfft, Academy... my job is *real*."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Payphone: "No response, only a sigh. The conne..."
links.text: No response, only a sigh. The connection crackles, like burning paper.

links.title: Volition: "What are you doing to yourself righ..."
links.text: What are you doing to yourself right now?

links.title: You: "I'm making a funny prank call."
links.text: I'm making a funny prank call.

links.title: Volition: "Fun? You need to stop. Harry. You'r..."
links.text: Fun? You need to stop. Harry. You're killing yourself.

links.title: You: "Catastrophic damage."
links.text: Catastrophic damage.

links.title: Volition: "You need to stop, Harry. You'll die..."
links.text: You need to stop, Harry. You'll die.

links.title: You: "I don't know... I don't understand..."
links.text: I don't know... I don't understand what's happening.

links.title: Volition: "You need to stop. Harry. You're kil..."
links.text: You need to stop. Harry. You're killing yourself.

links.title: You: ""I am the law. I'm a detective. I'm..."
links.text: "I am the law. I'm a detective. I'm doing a case. There's a hanged man."

links.title: Payphone: "She does not answer anymore."
links.text: She does not answer anymore.

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna solve it.""
links.text: "I'm gonna solve it."

links.title: Payphone: ""Harry...""
links.text: "Harry..."

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone -- the machine ran..."
links.text: Disconnect tone -- the machine ran out of money.

links.title: Shivers: "Run. To the church. Home. Anywhere..."
links.text: Run. To the church. Home. Anywhere but here. Anything but calling her again.

links.title: You: ""It doesn't matter. This case doesn..."
links.text: "It doesn't matter. This case doesn't matter."

links.title: You: ""None of it matters -- not anymore.""
links.text: "None of it matters -- not anymore."

links.title: You: ""Can you help me solve it? I need t..."
links.text: "Can you help me solve it? I need to solve it. They won't take me back if I don't."

links.title: You: ""My heart hurts. I'm gonna have a h..."
links.text: "My heart hurts. I'm gonna have a heart attack."

links.title: Payphone: ""Oh no... please stop. Please let's..."
links.text: "Oh no... please stop. Please let's just hang up..."

links.title: You: ""Is someone there with you?""
links.text: "Is someone there with you?"

links.title: Payphone: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: "(Hang up.)"
links.text: (Hang up.)

links.title: Payphone: "Your hand isn't moving. The headset..."
links.text: Your hand isn't moving. The headset hisses in your ear with *evil* sadness.

links.title: Volition: "Right now. I'm gonna give you *one*..."
links.text: Right now. I'm gonna give you *one* chance.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Push the headset in the cradle with..."
links.text: Push the headset in the cradle with all the strength you have!

links.title: You: "Smash the headset into the cradle."
links.text: Smash the headset into the cradle.

links.title: Payphone: "The cord dangles in the wind like a..."
links.text: The cord dangles in the wind like a sickening worm.

links.title: You: "No. I can't. I need the pain."
links.text: No. I can't. I need the pain.

links.title: Payphone: "Static sings inside the phone glued..."
links.text: Static sings inside the phone glued to your ear. Ancient, sticky...

links.title: You: ""Ooo... are you there?""
links.text: "Ooo... are you there?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Okay I'm drunk, what does it matte..."
links.text: "Okay I'm drunk, what does it matter? I'm still *me*!"

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna get even drunker." (Take..."
links.text: "I'm gonna get even drunker." (Take a big sip.)

links.title: You: ""I'm not drunk -- I'm *high*.""
links.text: "I'm not drunk -- I'm *high*."

links.title: You: ""I'm not drunk or high, I'm just......"
links.text: "I'm not drunk or high, I'm just... hurt... why does it hurt to talk to you?"

links.title: You: ""I am the last faithful kingsman. I..."
links.text: "I am the last faithful kingsman. I will free the city of Revachol. I will turn back the sea. I will reverse time." (Proceed.)

links.title: Payphone: ""You're not a kingsman, Harry... Yo..."
links.text: "You're not a kingsman, Harry... You're drunk."

links.title: You: ""I am an ultra-high-net-worth indiv..."
links.text: "I am an ultra-high-net-worth individual. I understand how reality works. I have *seen* into it. My mind is clear." (Proceed.)

links.title: Payphone: ""You're not a high-net-worth indivi..."
links.text: "You're not a high-net-worth individual, Harry... You're drunk."

links.title: You: ""I can't *tell* you who I am. I hav..."
links.text: "I can't *tell* you who I am. I have a secret plan to win mankind three thousand years of peace on this planet. I have to be ominously vague..." (Proceed.)

links.title: Payphone: ""You're not ominous, Harry... You'r..."
links.text: "You're not ominous, Harry... You're drunk."

links.title: You: ""I don't know who I am. I am an amn..."
links.text: "I don't know who I am. I am an amnesiac." (Proceed.)

links.title: Payphone: ""You're not an amnesiac, Harry... Y..."
links.text: "You're not an amnesiac, Harry... You're drunk."

links.title: You: ""Your voice is so beautiful.""
links.text: "Your voice is so beautiful."

links.title: Payphone: ""No-no..." She's waking up now. "It..."
links.text: "No-no..." She's waking up now. "It's *you*, isn't it? It's you..."

links.title: You: ""Good bye.""
links.text: "Good bye."

links.title: Payphone: "A sigh. She heard you, but she does..."
links.text: A sigh. She heard you, but she does not hang up. And neither do you. You can't.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "That's it. You're caught in a trap...."
links.text: That's it. You're caught in a trap. It'll take quite a while for the shit-circus to end now.

links.title: Half Light: "Pitiful and terrifying. You feel yo..."
links.text: Pitiful and terrifying. You feel your pulse rise with each ring...

links.title: You: "Stop!"
links.text: Stop!

links.title: Interfacing: "41 -- 44 -- 47 --  it's too late no..."
links.text: 41 -- 44 -- 47 --  it's too late now, the movement is almost mechanical.

links.title: Interfacing: "Again you close your eyes -- and ag..."
links.text: Again you close your eyes -- and again your fingers move on the rotary dial. Ten metallic rings as the dial returns to zero after each number.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "And calling -- for two minutes now...."
links.text: And calling -- for two minutes now. You're out of luck. No one's home there either. But the payphone still has your ten cents in there...

links.title: Interfacing: "You close your eyes and feel your f..."
links.text: You close your eyes and feel your finger move on the rotary dial. You start with 005, as before...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The area code for Revachol Zone of..."
links.text: The area code for Revachol Zone of Control.

links.title: Payphone: "Followed by seven digits at random...."
links.text: Followed by seven digits at random. The last one makes the silence turn into a ring. It's calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Still calling..."
links.text: Still calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Still..."
links.text: Still...

links.title: Payphone: "Time keeps passing. In the distance..."
links.text: Time keeps passing. In the distance, seagulls squawk -- no one is home at this number. But the coin... it's still in there... you find yourself thinking:

links.title: Interfacing: "What were you trying to achieve by..."
links.text: What were you trying to achieve by closing your eyes? Did you want your muscle memory to take over and call somewhere? Where?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Home?"
links.text: Home?

links.title: Inland Empire: "He doesn't have a home. His home is..."
links.text: He doesn't have a home. His home is under a boat.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He doesn't have a home. Not anymore..."
links.text: He doesn't have a home. Not anymore.

links.title: Endurance: "His own *heart*."
links.text: His own *heart*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's *really* time to stop this now..."
links.text: It's *really* time to stop this now.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah, *bratan*. We've had all the f..."
links.text: Yeah, *bratan*. We've had all the fun there was to have here. And it wasn't much.

links.title: You: ""You want my MONEY?!" (Punch the ph..."
links.text: "You want my MONEY?!" (Punch the phone.)

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and your knu..."
links.text: The cold metal is hard and your knuckles bleed.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Takes your mind away from that voic..."
links.text: Takes your mind away from that voice, for one second at least...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's enough now, officer..." The..."
links.text: "That's enough now, officer..." The lieutenant stands at a distance.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Punch it again, the pain is good."
links.text: Punch it again, the pain is good.

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and your knu..."
links.text: The cold metal is hard and your knuckles bleed a little...

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and hurts yo..."
links.text: The cold metal is hard and hurts your knuckles. You look at them turning purple.

links.title: You: ""You want more money now, huh?! YOU..."
links.text: "You want more money now, huh?! YOU WANT FUCKING MONEY?!!!?" (Punch the phone again.)

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.text: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your hand is swelling up."
links.text: Your hand is swelling up.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer -- that's enough. Let's re..."
links.text: "Officer -- that's enough. Let's return to work..."

links.title: Volition: "That's right. Walk away."
links.text: That's right. Walk away.

links.title: Logic: "It's over."
links.text: It's over.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Fuck it, it doesn't hurt."
links.text: Fuck it, it doesn't hurt.

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.text: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money. Nothing. Your hand is turning blue now... blood drips to the ground.

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.text: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money. Your hand is turning blue now... blood drips to the ground.

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial the long p..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial the long phone number again.

links.title: Payphone: "You dial the number again -- twenty..."
links.text: You dial the number again -- twenty six pulls of the rotary dial. The machine eats the coin and a terrifying ocean of distance rustles in your ear...

links.title: Payphone: "In the middle of it -- a familiar r..."
links.text: In the middle of it -- a familiar ring. Small. Distorted.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Volition: "Put it down."
links.text: Put it down.

links.title: Authority: "Before it's too late, please."
links.text: Before it's too late, please.

links.title: You: "Hang up."
links.text: Hang up.

links.title: Payphone: "The headset lands in the cradle wit..."
links.text: The headset lands in the cradle with a clank.

links.title: Volition: "Now walk away. Forget about this. W..."
links.text: Now walk away. Forget about this. Walk away and do police work. *BURY* this in yourself and move on.

links.title: You: "Let it call!"
links.text: Let it call!

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Empathy: "It looks like she does not want to..."
links.text: It looks like she does not want to pick it up, Harry. Stop scaring her.

links.title: You: "Why?"
links.text: Why?

links.title: Empathy: "C'mon, you know why."
links.text: C'mon, you know why.

links.title: You: "Still, let it ring."
links.text: Still, let it ring.

links.title: You: "Hang up."
links.text: Hang up.

links.title: You: "Just let it ring."
links.text: Just let it ring.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: ""Harry, please..." A sad voice answ..."
links.text: "Harry, please..." A sad voice answers, dressed in distortion.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Underneath it she is naked and warm..."
links.text: Underneath it she is naked and warm under a blanket.

links.title: You: ""You're warm.""
links.text: "You're warm."

links.title: Payphone: "There's a sigh."
links.text: There's a sigh.

links.title: You: ""You're naked, aren't you?" (Beat t..."
links.text: "You're naked, aren't you?" (Beat the handset against the phone.)

links.title: Payphone: "You can't hear her reply."
links.text: You can't hear her reply.

links.title: You: ""I need answers to my *mystery*.""
links.text: "I need answers to my *mystery*."

links.title: Payphone: ""Please. I am going to hang up now,..."
links.text: "Please. I am going to hang up now, okay?"

links.title: Payphone: "Phone hanging up."
links.text: Phone hanging up.

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone."
links.text: Disconnect tone.

links.title: You: ""I need to know who you are. WHO AR..."
links.text: "I need to know who you are. WHO ARE YOU?!"

links.title: You: ""'Harry please?!' -- I am going to..."
links.text: "'Harry please?!' -- I am going to *end* this call, dammit."

links.title: Payphone: ""Please do. Just please do.""
links.text: "Please do. Just please do."

links.title: You: ""There was someone there before. I..."
links.text: "There was someone there before. I heard someone. Who's there with you?"

links.title: Payphone: "She does not answer. All you hear i..."
links.text: She does not answer. All you hear is hiss.

links.title: You: ""Pick it up!""
links.text: "Pick it up!"

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: You: "Just let it ring."
links.text: Just let it ring.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial the long p..."
links.text: Put 10 cents in and dial the long phone number one more time.

links.title: Payphone: "You dial the number again -- as you..."
links.text: You dial the number again -- as you've done many times. You remember it well now: 001 -- 41 -- 44 -- 47 -- 11 -- 17 -- 361 -- 451 -- 67 -- 451 -- 451.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.text: Calling...

links.title: Payphone: "And calling -- for who knows how lo..."
links.text: And calling -- for who knows how long. But no one answers. You need to insert more money to call again.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "There's still some unused change in..."
dialogueTree.text: There's still some unused change in there -- the machine waits for a number to be dialled.

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "You pick up the handset. There's a..."
dialogueTree.text: You pick up the handset. There's a tone -- the machine is operable.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs apathetically..."
links.text: The lieutenant shrugs apathetically, then walks a little distance away to concentrate on his notes. Looks like he'd rather not get into it again.

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "A metal payphone under a yellow pla..."
dialogueTree.text: A metal payphone under a yellow plastic dome. You could use it to call someone, unless you're out of change...

links.title: You: "Pick up the handset."
links.text: Pick up the handset.

links.title: Payphone: "You hear the tone -- the machine is..."
links.text: You hear the tone -- the machine is operable.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
